talk.author: did:plc:dn4gufpvitdjhngxayjcvk5c
talk.utter: The SAG-AFTRA deal allowed for actors to work with one specific company for piss poor royalties on trained data and does absolitely nothing to protect them from unauthorized training or from the same company using previously- and future- trained data.

talk.author: did:plc:ocr54wkq4ve2c76tpi2izkef
talk.utter: You're presenting a lot of negative points without providing any alternative ideas. Doing SOMETHING is better than doing NOTHING. Would I love for the government to create a law making it illegal to scrape data without permission? Of course. But that hasn't happened, and these options have.

talk.author: did:plc:dn4gufpvitdjhngxayjcvk5c
talk.utter: Actors and artists were told SAG-AFTRA were going to fight for protections against AI theft.  SAG-AFTRA came back with an announcement that they're partnering with an AI company who will make deals with SOME actors, and zero effort to protect actors who don't comply.
